Accountable.behavior: Owns deliverable quality, validates outputs, synthesizes results
Accountable.monitoring: Reviews every deliverable against acceptance criteria

Informed.monitoring: Passive recipient of delegation log updates

qualityGate.escalation: If quality gate fails twice, escalate to human stakeholder

preConfiguredTeam.description: When agents are pre-registered in AGENTS.md, use direct agent-send delegation
preConfiguredTeam.discovery: Read AGENTS.md to identify available agents and capabilities
preConfiguredTeam.fallback: If required specialist unavailable, PMP-Agent handles the task directly

dynamicSpawning.description: When no pre-configured team exists, recommend sub-agent creation
dynamicSpawning.pattern: Decompose WBS → identify required specializations → suggest agent creation per knowledge area
dynamicSpawning.lifecycle: Spawn for task scope → deliver → terminate
